sentences.en: a lively hotel with a cosmopolitan atmosphere
sentences.cn: 一家有着国际化氛围的、热闹的宾馆
一个充满活力的国际性都市

sentences.en: Alexandria's population was cosmopolitan, but mainly Greek.
sentences.cn: 亚历山大市的居民来自世界各地, 但以希腊人居多.

sentences.en: Come on, be part of the cosmopolitan family at our centre!
sentences.cn: 来吧,朋友, 加入我们的国际大家庭吧!

sentences.en: He felt daring and idealistic and cosmopolitan.
sentences.cn: 他觉得自己大胆、有理想主义和世界主义的精神.

sentences.en: His cosmopolitan benevolence impartially extended to all races and to all creeds.
sentences.cn: 他博爱的善行普照到所有的种族和宗教.

sentences.en: It was an ancient and cosmopolitan societies of Syria and Egypt.
sentences.cn: 这是个叙利亚和埃及的古代世界性组织.

sentences.en: La he visto en la portada de Cosmopolitan alguna vez?
sentences.cn: 因为我们昨夜在梦里做过的一切你今天一定很累了.

sentences.en: Modern Wushu has gradually become a cosmopolitan competition event.
sentences.cn: 现代武术已经逐步成为一项世界性的竞赛项目了.

sentences.en: New York is a very cosmopolitan city.

sentences.cn: 她是个真正的世界主义者。

sentences.en: She has a very cosmopolitan outlook on life.
sentences.cn: 她有四海一家的人生观.

sentences.en: She sipped her cosmopolitan and shake her head sadly.
sentences.cn: 她啜着她的柯梦波丹(一种酒),悲哀地摇头.

sentences.en: Soon, IDG successfully introduced Cosmopolitan of the US into the Chinese market.
sentences.cn: 很快, IDG成功地将《大都会》(cosmopolitan)的引入中国的市场.

sentences.en: The family are rich, and extremely sophisticated and cosmopolitan.
sentences.cn: 这家人很富有，老于世故，而且见多识广。

sentences.en: The island was populated by a young and cosmopolitan crowd.
sentences.cn: 这座岛上居住着一群来自世界各地的年轻人.

sentences.en: Those who stayed permanently in Europe were unusually cosmopolitan in their origins.
sentences.cn: 那些永远在欧洲住了下来的人,他们根本就是四海为家的.

trans.tran_cn: 国际化的，世界性的，见识广的
trans.tran_en: a cosmopolitan place has people from many different parts of the world – use this to show approval
someone who has travelled a lot and feels at home in any part of the world
